content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. I'm sure you'll find the location of the apartment quite convenient. Let's hear your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the central location but regretfully, in my pursuit of an affordable price, I must negotiate further. As a diligent student, I'm cautious in my spending, and thus, I'm unable to accept the current price discussion, due to budget constraints. I'll continue searching for a suitable compromise. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
